thread.title: Xbox One controller remapping coming for all pads soon

title: Xbox One controller remapping coming for all pads soon
text:
Xbox One controller remapping coming for all pads soon 
Published By: Eurogamer.net - Today 
All Xbox One pads will soon feature remappable controls, Microsoft has said.The feature is currently limited to the lovely but pricey Xbox O...
